email.incomingsupport.body1.en: A customer has sent the following info
email.incomingsupport.body1.translation: En kund har skickat följande information

email.secret_link.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.secret_link.link_works_once.translation: Denna länk fungerar bara en gång. Efter visning raderas hemligheten permanent.

email.welcome.subject.en: Welcome to %{product_name} - Please verify your email

email.welcome.title.translation: Du har blivit inbjuden att gå med i %{product_name}!

email.welcome.verify_prompt.en: Please verify your email address by clicking the link below:
email.welcome.verify_prompt.translation: Vänligen verifiera din e-postadress genom att klicka på länken nedan:

email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.welcome.copy_link_prompt.translation: Eller kopiera och klistra in denna länk:

email.welcome.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}. If you did not create an account, you can safely ignore this message.
email.welcome.postscript.translation: P.S. Detta e-postmeddelande skickades till %{email_address}. Om du inte förväntade dig denna inbjudan kan du ignorera detta meddelande.

email.password_request.request_notice.en: We received a request to reset your password for %{product_name}.
email.password_request.request_notice.translation: Vi har mottagit en begäran om att återställa ditt lösenord för %{product_name}.

email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.password_request.copy_link_prompt.translation: Eller kopiera och klistra in denna länk:

email.password_request.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.
email.password_request.ignore_notice.translation: Om du inte begärde en lösenordsåterställning kan du ignorera detta e-postmeddelande.

email.password_request.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.

email.magic_link.request_notice.en: You requested a login link for your %{product_name} account.
email.magic_link.request_notice.translation: Du begärde en inloggningslänk för ditt %{product_name}-konto.

email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.magic_link.copy_link_prompt.translation: Eller kopiera och klistra in denna länk:

email.magic_link.expiration_notice.en: This link will expire in 15 minutes.
email.magic_link.expiration_notice.translation: Denna länk går ut om 15 minuter.

email.magic_link.ignore_notice.en: If you did not request this link, you can safely ignore this email.
email.magic_link.ignore_notice.translation: Om du inte begärde denna länk kan du ignorera detta e-postmeddelande.

email.magic_link.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{email_address}.

email.incoming_secret.subject.translation: Du har fått ett hemligt meddelande

email.incoming_secret.received_message.translation: Du har fått ett säkert meddelande:

email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.en: Someone has sent you a secure message through %{display_domain}.
email.incoming_secret.someone_sent.translation: Någon har skickat dig ett säkert meddelande via %{display_domain}.

email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.en: To view this secret, click the link below:
email.incoming_secret.view_instructions.translation: Klicka på länken nedan för att visa hemligheten:

email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.en: This link will only work once. After viewing, the secret will be permanently deleted.
email.incoming_secret.link_works_once.translation: Denna länk fungerar bara en gång. Efter visning raderas hemligheten permanent.

email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.en: This is an automated notification. No action is required.
email.secret_revealed.automated_notice.translation: Detta är en automatisk avisering. Ingen åtgärd krävs.

email.expiration_warning.subject.en: Your secret link will expire soon
email.expiration_warning.subject.translation: Din hemliga länk går snart ut

email.expiration_warning.expires_in.en: Your secret link will expire in %{time_remaining}
email.expiration_warning.expires_in.translation: Din hemliga länk går ut om %{time_remaining}

email.expiration_warning.view_button.en: View your secret before it expires
email.expiration_warning.view_button.translation: Visa din hemlighet innan den går ut

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.translation: Efter utgångsdatumet raderas hemligheten permanent och kan inte återställas.

email.expiration_warning.after_expiratio.en: After expiration, the secret will be permanently deleted.

email.organization_invitation.subject.translation: Du har blivit inbjuden att gå med i %{organization_name}

email.organization_invitation.title.translation: Du har blivit inbjuden att gå med i %{organization_name}!

email.organization_invitation.body.en: %{inviter_email} has invited you to join "%{organization_name}" as %{role_description}.
email.organization_invitation.body.translation: %{inviter_email} har bjudit in dig att gå med i "%{organization_name}" som %{role_description}.

email.organization_invitation.link_instr.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.organization_invitation.link_instr.translation: Eller kopiera och klistra in denna länk:

email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.en: This invitation will expire in %{days} days.
email.organization_invitation.expiry_not.translation: Denna inbjudan upphör att gälla om %{days} dagar.

email.organization_invitation.decline_in.en: If you don't want to join, you can simply ignore this email or decline the invitation.
email.organization_invitation.decline_in.translation: Om du inte vill gå med kan du helt enkelt ignorera detta e-postmeddelande eller avböja inbjudan.

email.organization_invitation.postscript.en: P.S. This email was sent to %{invited_email}. If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this message.
email.organization_invitation.postscript.translation: P.S. Detta e-postmeddelande skickades till %{invited_email}. Om du inte förväntade dig denna inbjudan kan du ignorera detta meddelande.

email.password_changed.body.en: Your password for %{product_name} was changed on %{date} at %{time}.
email.password_changed.body.translation: Ditt lösenord för %{product_name} ändrades den %{date} kl. %{time}.

email.password_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately by resetting your password and contacting support.
email.password_changed.security_notice.translation: Om du inte gjorde denna ändring, vänligen säkra ditt konto omedelbart genom att återställa ditt lösenord och kontakta supporten.

email.email_changed.body.en: The email address for your %{product_name} account was changed to %{new_email_masked} on %{date}.
email.email_changed.body.translation: E-postadressen för ditt %{product_name}-konto ändrades till %{new_email_masked} den %{date}.

email.email_changed.security_notice.en: If you did not make this change, please contact support immediately as your account may be compromised.
email.email_changed.security_notice.translation: Om du inte gjorde denna ändring, vänligen kontakta supporten omedelbart eftersom ditt konto kan ha komprometterats.

email.email_change_confirmation.body.en: Please verify this email address to complete the change for your %{product_name} account.
email.email_change_confirmation.body.translation: Vänligen verifiera denna e-postadress för att slutföra ändringen av ditt %{product_name}-konto.

email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.en: Or copy and paste this link:
email.email_change_confirmation.copy_lin.translation: Eller kopiera och klistra in denna länk:

email.mfa_enabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was enabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.

email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.en: Your account is now more secure. You will need to enter a verification code from your authenticator app when signing in.
email.mfa_enabled.security_notice.translation: Ditt konto är nu säkrare. Du kommer att behöva ange en verifieringskod från din autentiseringsapp vid inloggning.

email.mfa_disabled.body.en: Two-factor authentication was disabled for your %{product_name} account on %{date}.

email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.en: Your account is now less secure. If you did not make this change, please secure your account immediately.
email.mfa_disabled.warning_notice.translation: Ditt konto är nu mindre säkert. Om du inte gjorde denna ändring, vänligen säkra ditt konto omedelbart.

email.new_login_alert.body.en: A new sign-in to your %{product_name} account was detected on %{date} at %{time}.
email.new_login_alert.body.translation: En ny inloggning till ditt %{product_name}-konto upptäcktes den %{date} kl. %{time}.

email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.en: If this wasn't you, your account may be compromised.
email.new_login_alert.not_you_notice.translation: Om det inte var du kan ditt konto ha komprometterats.

email.member_removed.body.en: You have been removed from the organization "%{organization_name}" on %{product_name}.
email.member_removed.body.translation: Du har tagits bort från organisationen "%{organization_name}" på %{product_name}.

email.role_changed.body.en: Your role in "%{organization_name}" has been changed from %{old_role} to %{new_role}.
email.role_changed.body.translation: Din roll i "%{organization_name}" har ändrats från %{old_role} till %{new_role}.

email.organization_deleted.body.en: The organization "%{organization_name}" has been deleted from %{product_name}. All associated data has been removed.
email.organization_deleted.body.translation: Organisationen "%{organization_name}" har raderats från %{product_name}. All tillhörande data har tagits bort.

email.payment_receipt.body.en: Thank you for your payment. Here are your payment details:
email.payment_receipt.body.translation: Tack för din betalning. Här är dina betalningsuppgifter:

email.payment_failed.body.en: We were unable to process your payment for %{product_name}. Please update your payment method to avoid service interruption.
email.payment_failed.body.translation: Vi kunde inte behandla din betalning för %{product_name}. Vänligen uppdatera din betalningsmetod för att undvika avbrott i tjänsten.

email.trial_expiring.body.en: Your free trial of %{product_name} will expire in %{days_remaining} days. Upgrade now to keep access to all features.
email.trial_expiring.body.translation: Din kostnadsfria provperiod av %{product_name} går ut om %{days_remaining} dagar. Uppgradera nu för att behålla tillgång till alla funktioner.

email.subscription_changed.body.en: Your %{product_name} subscription has been changed from %{old_plan} to %{new_plan}.
